#| label: heatmap example
#| fig-cap: "A heatmap of PCW installations"

# !pip install leafmap geopandas pycrs osmnx

import os
import leafmap.foliumap as leafmap
#import leafmap


m = leafmap.Map(
    center=(39.9826, -75.13469), 
    zoom=14,
    draw_control=False,
    measure_control=False,
    fullscreen_control=False,
    )
in_csv = "/Users/felipevaldez/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-TempleUniversity/Work in Progress/Leafmap/heatmap_files/hubs.csv"
m.add_heatmap(
    in_csv,
    latitude="lat",
    longitude='lon',
    value="value",
    name="Heat map",
    radius=20,
)

colors = ['blue', 'yellow', 'red']
vmin = 0
vmax = 10000
m.add_colorbar(colors=colors, vmin=vmin, vmax=vmax)
m.add_title("PCW Heat Map", font_size="20px", align="center")
m
